ValidationRule.description: LEM-2983: Validates if Store Page Banner is included when Configuration is custom and Product Type is not Banner, Sponsored Listing, Sponsored Products, CRM LEM-12189: Clean up Brief/Brief Item Metadata
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Campaign Building'), ISPICKVAL(Brief__r.Configuration__c, 'Custom (Ad Ops)'), ISPICKVAL(Store_Page_Banner_Included_for_Promo__c, ''), NOT($Permission.Bypass_Brief_Item_Validation_Rules), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'Banners'), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'CRM'), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'Branded Collections'), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'Sampling'), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'Custom Marketing Promotion'), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'Sponsored Products'), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'Sponsored Brands'), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'Sponsored Listings'))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please indicate if your campaign will have a Store Page Banner included for this promo before updating the Status to 'Campaign Buildingâ€™.
